document_title: What are genital papillomas? Benign or malignant? Causes and symptoms
subsection_content: Have. Genital papillomas caused by viruses are dangerous to health. Genital papillomas are caused by viruses, so patients need to see a doctor for early diagnosis and treatment to avoid spreading to nearby skin areas, to partners and to limit infection with other STIs. In addition, papillomas caused by HPV can progress to cancer if not detected and treated early.
subsection_title: u nhu sinh duc.json. Are genital papillomas dangerous?
subsection_data:
u nhu sinh duc.json. Are genital papillomas dangerous?
Have. Genital papillomas caused by viruses are dangerous to health. Genital papillomas are caused by viruses, so patients need to see a doctor for early diagnosis and treatment to avoid spreading to nearby skin areas, to partners and to limit infection with other STIs. In addition, papillomas caused by HPV can progress to cancer if not detected and treated early.
